Because other families’ decisions can change from round to round, we are not able to give a firm timeline for when (or whether) we will move to the next family in the order. If we reach the point where we can consider your application for the place, we will contact you promptly.

If you would like to be ready for immediate consideration the moment we are able to move further down the list, you may submit an [APPLY] again in a future round; we will respond immediately according to capacity and priority at that time.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions
